projects.title: Flipkart Clone
projects.bodyText:
Flipkart is one of India's leading E-commerce marketplaces 


 Features:
 - Social Sign-in/Sign-up 
 - Product Page 
 - User authentication 

 Areas of responsibility: 
 - Laid out the database schema and build the REST API for the same.
 - Developed the Product Details Page. 

 A collaborative project built by a team of 5 executed in 5 days.

projects.title: BigBasket Clone
projects.bodyText:
BigBasket is an online food and grocery store that delivers personal and household needs right to customers' doorstep.


 Features:
 - Product Page 
 - User authentication 
 - Payment Gateway 

 Areas of responsibility: 
 - Laid out the database schema and build the REST API for the same.
 - Developed My Basket and Cart Page 
 - used Material UI for Popover 

 A collaborative project built by a team of 5 executed in 5 days.
